channel.title: Factor Zero Re-Hosted. Oldschool Lumbridge Pking
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/vpb8y1.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=3][img]http://ikov.org/images/advert/forums.png[/img][URL=http://"www.google.com"]Website: Coming Soon...[/URL] [img]http://ikov.org/images/advert/forums.png[/img][URL=http://"www.google.com"]Forums: Coming Soon...[/URL] [img]http://ikov.org/images/advert/play.png[/img][URL=http://"www.google.com"]Webclient: Coming Soon...[/URL] [img]http://ikov.org/images/advert/download.png[/img][URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/gt2o667nilbth7t/FZ%20Client.jar"]Download[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Features -Also Pk point farming is 100% stopped in this server, it is impossible to pk point farm unless you have a group of 6+ with all IP changers :P and still then it takes an hour plus to get 1 point by that method (Tested it with players) so you'd be better off pking normally.[/COLOR][/b]
[b]-Takes 5 Minutes To Start Pking And Get Going[/b] [b]-Fully Working PvP Point System[/b] [B]-Memory Leaks Fixed Thanks To Jinrake[/B] [B]-All skills working, trainable skilling area.[/B] [b]-Fully Working Dragon Claw Specials[/b] [b]-Fully Working Dark Bow Specials[/b] [b]-Fully Working Godsword Specials[/b] [b]-Fully Working PvP Timer When Entering Safe Zones[/b] [b]-Fully Working 100% Clan Chat With Lootshare[/b] [b]-Weapon Stats Powered Correctly, No Weapon Overpowered More Than It Should Be[/b] [b]-Toggle Gameframes Between 474, 484, 508, and 525[/b] [b]-All PvP Armour[/b] [b]-Working PvP Tasks, Complete Them For Rewards[/b] [b]-Click For 1k Barrage Casts, 1k Veng Runes, Bolts And Food[/b] [b]-4 Bosses That All Drop Useful Pking Items Such As Claws, DFS, Ranger Boots, Elemental Shield, Robin Hood And More[/b] [b]-Donaters Tab, Allows Donaters To Recharge Special, Acces Bank From Anywhere, And Restore Hitpoints. NOTE: It does not allow you to use these in PvP Zones[/b] [b]-Server Hosted On A VPS 100% Uptime[/b] [b]-Minor And Major Updates To Keep Server Fresh (Were Being Serious This Isnt BS Like Other Servers)[/b] [b]-Every Skill Works 100%[/b] [b]-Perfect Pking, Added Working Timers[/b] [b]-Friendly Staff Who Know What Their Doing, No Noobs That Bought Staff[/b] [b]-Hoilday Events, And Server Events[/b] [b]-Stable Economy[/b] [b]-Working Rushing[/b] [b]-Webclient and Desktop Client[/b] [b]-Donaters Recieve Items Within 24 Hours[/b] [b]-Working Mime Random Event + Sand which Lady[/b]
[CENTER][SIZE=6]New items + New char models[/SIZE][/CENTER] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/wtd27d.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=5][CENTER][U]OLD[/U] player pictures[/CENTER][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2vubu6a.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/x3u7fq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2qkmcmq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2sbqr90.jpg[/img]
[CENTER][SIZE=7]Training[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk201/silabk0ed/train.gif[/img]
[CENTER][SIZE=7]Pk Timer[/SIZE][/CENTER] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/4hw5fs.jpg[/img]
[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF8C00"]95% Real dragon claws, (i updated the height gfx after this .gif was taken)[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER] [IMG]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk201/silabk0ed/Untitled-2.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk201/silabk0ed/dags-2.png[/img]
[COLOR="orange"][B][SIZE="7"][CENTER]Gambling[/CENTER][/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/28clt05.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/ZsZSTE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/30ieqm1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/wu3q04.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2rqjejk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/eafgjo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2qnw2ub.jpg[/img]

item.title: Factor Zero Re-Hosted. Oldschool Lumbridge Pking
item.dc:creator: @Savy2007 Savy2007
item.description:
@Savy2007 wrote:

[center]

[SIZE=3][URL=http://“www.google.com”]Website: Coming Soon…[/URL] [URL=http://“www.google.com”]Forums: Coming Soon…[/URL] [URL=http://“www.google.com”]Webclient: Coming Soon…[/URL] [URL=http://“https://dl.dropbox.com/s/gt2o667nilbth7t/FZ%20Client.jar”]Download[/URL][/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Features
-Also Pk point farming is 100% stopped in this server, it is impossible to pk point farm unless you have a group of 6+ with all IP changers and still then it takes an hour plus to get 1 point by that method (Tested it with players) so you’d be better off pking normally.[/COLOR][/b]

-Takes 5 Minutes To Start Pking And Get Going
-Fully Working PvP Point System
[B]-Memory Leaks Fixed Thanks To Jinrake[/B]
[B]-All skills working, trainable skilling area.[/B]
-Fully Working Dragon Claw Specials
-Fully Working Dark Bow Specials
-Fully Working Godsword Specials
-Fully Working PvP Timer When Entering Safe Zones
-Fully Working 100% Clan Chat With Lootshare
-Weapon Stats Powered Correctly, No Weapon Overpowered More Than It Should Be
-Toggle Gameframes Between 474, 484, 508, and 525
-All PvP Armour
-Working PvP Tasks, Complete Them For Rewards
-Click For 1k Barrage Casts, 1k Veng Runes, Bolts And Food
-4 Bosses That All Drop Useful Pking Items Such As Claws, DFS, Ranger Boots, Elemental Shield, Robin Hood And More
-Donaters Tab, Allows Donaters To Recharge Special, Acces Bank From Anywhere, And Restore Hitpoints. NOTE: It does not allow you to use these in PvP Zones
-Server Hosted On A VPS 100% Uptime
-Minor And Major Updates To Keep Server Fresh (Were Being Serious This Isnt BS Like Other Servers)
-Every Skill Works 100%
-Perfect Pking, Added Working Timers
-Friendly Staff Who Know What Their Doing, No Noobs That Bought Staff
-Hoilday Events, And Server Events
-Stable Economy
-Working Rushing
-Webclient and Desktop Client
-Donaters Recieve Items Within 24 Hours
-Working Mime Random Event + Sand which Lady

[CENTER][SIZE=6]New items + New char models[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[SIZE=5][CENTER][U]OLD[/U] player pictures[/CENTER][/SIZE]
